revisions.rev:
This is a list of [[Flag of Pakistan|flags]] used in '''[[Pakistan]]'''. {{Commons category|Flags of Pakistan}} ==National Flag== {| class="wikitable" |- style="background:#efefef;" ! style="width:110px;"|Flag!! style="width:100px;"|Date!! style="width:250px;"|Use!! style="width:250px;"|Description |- | [[File:Flag of Pakistan.svg|100px|border]] || [[1947]] - Present || [[Flag of Pakistan|National flag of Pakistan]] || Two stripes, four fifths green, one fifth white, with the traditional Islamic symbols of a crescent & star on the green section. |} ==Government Flags== {| class="wikitable" |- style="background:#efefef;" ! style="width:110px;"|Flag!! style="width:100px;"|Date!! style="width:250px;"|Use!! style="width:250px;"|Description |- | [[File:Flag of the President of Pakistan.svg|100px]] || || [[President of Pakistan|Presidential flag of Pakistan]] || The crescent and star surrounded by wheat branches on a green field, with the Urdu name for Pakistan below. (rarely used) |- | [[File:Flag of the Prime Minister of Pakistan.svg|100px]] || || [[Prime Minister of Pakistan]] ||Ratio: 1:1
(rarely used) |} ==Civil Ensign== {| class="wikitable" |- style="background:#efefef;" ! style="width:110px;"|Flag!! style="width:100px;"|Date!! style="width:250px;"|Use!! style="width:250px;"|Description |- | [[File:Civil Ensign of Pakistan.svg|100px]] || [[1947]]â[[Present]] || [[civil ensign|Civil Ensign of Pakistan]] || A red ensign with the Flag of Pakistan in the canton influenced by the British design |} ==Civil Air Ensign== {| class="wikitable" |- style="background:#efefef;" ! style="width:110px;"|Flag!! style="width:100px;"|Date!! style="width:250px;"|Use!! style="width:250px;"|Description |- | [[File:Civil Air Ensign of Pakistan.svg|100px]] || || Civil Air Ensign of Pakistan || An ensign with the Flag of Pakistan in the canton influenced by the [[British Civil Air Ensign|British design]] |} ==Provincial and Territorial Flags== {| class="wikitable" |- style="background:#efefef;" ! style="width:110px;"|Flag!! style="width:100px;"|Date!! style="width:250px;"|Use!! style="width:250px;"|Description |- | || || [[Sindh]] provincial flag || A traditional green flag, with the provincial emblem in the centre. |- | [[File:Flag of Punjab.svg|100px]] || || [[Punjab (Pakistan)|Punjab]] provincial flag || A traditional green flag, with the provincial emblem in the centre. The emblem reflects Punjab's natural resources: its wheat, and the five rivers which give the province its name in [[Persian language|Persian]] (from ''Punj'' = Five, ''Aab'' = Waters). |- | [[File:Flag_of_Khyber_Pakhtunkhwa.svg|100px]] || || [[Khyber Pakhtunkwa]] provincial flag || A traditional green flag, with the provincial emblem on the flag shows the [[Jamrud]] fort which guards the [[Khyber Pass]], and mountains in the back. |- |[[File:Flag of Balochistan, PK.gif|100px]]|| || [[Balochistan (Pakistan)|Balochistan]] provincial flag || A traditional green flag, with the provincial emblem in the centre. The emblem shows stylised mountains of this barren province and the principal mode of transport: the [[Dromedary camel]], also the provincial animal of ''[[Pakistan]]i Balochistan''. |- | [[File:Flag of Azad Kashmir.svg|100px]] || || [[Azad Jammu and Kashmir]] territory flag || The flag displays the Pakistani national colours, white and dark green, with a crescent and star to represent the [[Muslim]] majority, and a saffron square to represent the [[Buddhist]], [[Hindu]], [[Sikh]] and other minorities of the disputed region, the colours are clearly influenced by the [[Mughal Empire]]. The four white stripes symbolize the main rivers of the [[Kashmir region]]; [[Indus]], [[Jhelum River|Jhelum]], [[Chenab River|Chenab]] and [[Ravi River|Ravi]]. |- |- |} ==Military== {| class="wikitable" |- style="background:#efefef;" ! style="width:110px;"|Flag!! style="width:100px;"|Date!! style="width:250px;"|Use!! style="width:250px;"|Description |- |- | [[File:Flag of the Pakistani Army.svg|100px|border]] || || Flag of the [[Pakistan Army]] || A version of the Flag of Pakistan, with the Army's badge |- | [[File:Pakistani Air Force Ensign.svg|100px|border]] || || Ensign of the [[Pakistan Air Force]] || A light blue ensign with the Flag of Pakistan in the canton, and the Air Force's roundel |- | [[File:Naval Standard of Pakistan.svg|100px]] || || Standard of the [[Pakistan Navy]] || The Navy's badge on the National Flag |- | [[File:Naval Ensign of Pakistan.svg|100px]] || || Ensign of the [[Pakistan Navy]] || National flag, but with ratio: 1:2 |- | [[File:Naval Jack of Pakistan.svg|100px]] || || Naval jack of the [[Pakistan Navy]] || The Navy's badge on a blue field |- | || || Standard of the [[Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff Committee, Pakistan]] || Trimmed with green, white, red, yellow, dark blue, and light blue intermingled fringe; the national flag with which it is displayed has green and white intermingled fringe. |} ==Cricket Flags== {| class="wikitable" |- style="background:#efefef;" ! style="width:110px;"|Flag!! style="width:100px;"|Date!! style="width:250px;"|Use!! style="width:250px;"|Description |- | || [[2004]] - Present || [[Sialkot Stallions]] || Stallion which shows the strength of Team.Stallion shows the speed of team's good performance. |} ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Lists of flags}} {{Pakistan topics}} {{DEFAULTSORT:List Of Pakistani Flags}} [[Category:Lists of flags|Pakistan]] [[Category:Pakistani culture]] [[Category:Pakistan-related lists|Flags]] [[nl:Lijst van vlaggen van Pakistan]] [[th:à¸à¸à¹à¸à¸à¸£à¸°à¹à¸à¸¨à¸à¸²à¸à¸µà¸ªà¸à¸²à¸]]
